text: Heaven Will Wait () is a 2016 French drama film directed by Marie-Castille Mention-Schaar. It was selected to be screened in the Contemporary World Cinema section at the 2016 Toronto International Film Festival. ==Cast== * Noémie Merlant as Sonia Bouzaria * Naomi Amarger as Mélanie Thenot * Sandrine Bonnaire as Catherine * Clotilde Courau as Sylvie * Zinedine Soualem as Samir * Dounia Bouzar as herself * Ariane Ascaride * Yvan Attal ==Reception== Allan Hunter of Screen Daily wrote that while the film "lack[s] subtlety in places, it still successfully evokes the human heartbreak beneath the news headlines." ==Accolades== Cast and director at a premiere. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! scope="col"|Award / Film Festival ! scope="col"|Category ! scope="col"|Recipients and nominees ! scope="col"|Result |- |César Awards |Most Promising Actress |Noémie Merlant | |- |rowspan=3|Lumières Awards |rowspan=2|Most Promising Actress | Naomi Amarger | |- |Noémie Merlant | |- |Best Screenplay |Emilie Frèche and Marie-Castille Mention-Schaar | |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 films Category:2016 drama films Category:French films Category:French drama films Category:French- language films
